name: paperclip
description: - Realtime editing. Biggest priority is to have a bundler that  - Interoperability. Paperclip should work with any web framework.  - Type safety.  - Visually editable.

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm:node && npm run build:node
scripts.build:watch: tsc --watch & (cd native && cargo watch -i .gitignore -i "pkg/*" -s 'wasm-pack build --target nodejs')
